title: Isekai Nanpa ~Mushoku Hikikomori No Ore Ga Sukiru Wo Kushi Shite Neko Ningen Ya Fuka Uchuu Dragon Ni Koe Wo Katte Mimashita~
alternative_title: Different World's Nanpa, Fantasy World Pickup Artis ; 異世界ナンパ〜無職ひきこもりのオレがスキルを駆使して猫人間や深宇宙ドラゴンに声をかけてみました〜 ; Menggombal di Dunia Lain
status: Different World's Nanpa, Fantasy World Pickup Artis ; 異世界ナンパ〜無職ひきこもりのオレがスキルを駆使して猫人間や深宇宙ドラゴンに声をかけてみました〜 ; Menggombal di Dunia Lain
description:
Description :
        It tells the story of an anti-social old man who was summoned by a tower wizard to save the world, told to reveal the skill he craved so much, then the old man decided to choose the seduce skill because he had been a virgin for far too long. (Not accurate)
